- **Operating System:** [e.g., Windows 11, macOS 14.1, Ubuntu 22.04]

## Diagnostic Report

**Please attach a diagnostic report:**

1. In the MCP Electron App, go to menu: **Diagnostics → Export Diagnostic Report**
2. Save the ZIP file
3. Attach it to this issue (drag and drop the file here)

> The diagnostic report contains logs, configuration (passwords removed), and system information.
> It helps us diagnose the issue faster!

If you cannot export a diagnostic report, please provide:
- Application logs (menu: **Diagnostics → Open Logs Directory**)
- Any error messages shown in the app
